story_19_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Our team has worked really hard to make it this
far in the tournament. We finally qualified for the
second half—for the finals!
story_19_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
But now what? Lear has challenged us to a battle
we can’t refuse. If we lose, he’s gonna kick us out
of the competition.
story_19_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Founder or not, I can’t believe he threatened to
revoke our right to compete! That’s just cruel!
story_19_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
You’re right... I’m not happy about the fact that
we’re being forced into a rematch when we’re
so close to the finals.
story_19_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
But it might be a good opportunity for
[Name:PlayerNickname ] to show off [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] skills.
Better be in top shape, though!
story_19_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: Rematch? You’ve battled against Lear before?
story_19_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Yeah, it was before you joined the team, Iris.
It didn’t go very well for us, though...
story_19_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
I see... Lear’s pretty powerful, huh? I learned that
the hard way when I battled against him, too.
story_19_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I think we’re gonna be all right, though!
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s a lot stronger now!
story_19_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Yeah! This time we’ll win for sure!
I believe in you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
story_19_01000/2401_0401_1300_10:
That’s the spirit! We’ll be right there with you,
supporting you all the way!
story_19_01000/2401_0401_1400_10:
Yeah. It’s important to the team that we win
this battle, but it’s more important that we—
story_19_01000/2401_0402_1600_10:
What’s wrong? I thought you’d be super excited
about beating Lear once and for all.
story_19_01000/2401_0402_1700_10:
I think [Name:PlayerNickname ] realizes that
even though winning is important for the team,
it’s even more important that we—
story_19_01000/2401_1001_1800_10: That we have fun! Right, team?
story_19_01000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Every battle has a winner and a loser, but that
shouldn’t be the only thing you focus on!
story_19_01000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Having fun is what’s most important when it
comes to Pokémon battling, don’t you think?
story_19_01000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Yeah! I think Skyla’s right! Winning or losing
doesn’t matter if you’re not having fun battling!
story_19_01000/2401_1001_2400_10:
True! We should all keep that in the back of our
minds...including a certain prince!
story_19_01000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Yep! I know all of us understand how
important it is to have fun...
story_19_01000/2401_1001_2600_10: but I don’t think Lear really understands that yet.
story_19_01000/2401_1001_2700_10:
I hope he learns soon...
Some things are more valuable than victory.
story_19_01000/2401_1001_2900_10:
Something tells me he’s going to be a tough nut
to crack.
story_19_01000/2401_1001_3000_10:
But he’s still a Pokémon Trainer, just like us.
Part of me wants to believe that deep down
he feels the same way we do.
story_19_01000/2401_1001_3100_10:
I think you’re the one who’s going to have to
help him realize that, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
He’s stuck on you, for whatever reason.
story_19_01000/2401_1001_3200_10:
It’s not going to be easy, but one way or another,
we have to get through to Lear during our battle.
story_19_01000/2401_1001_3300_10:
We’ve got to show him that there’s more to
Pokémon battling than victory alone!
